org.apache.poi.common.usermodel.fonts

Interface FontFacet

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FontEmbeddedData 

    @Beta
public interface FontFacet
    A FontFacet holds the font data for a shape of a font, i.e. a regular, italic, bold or bold-italic version of a Font.(FontFacet保存字体形状的字体数据，即字体的普通、粗体或粗-粗体版本。)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default java.lang.Object getFontData() 
      default int getWeight()
      Get the font weight.(获取字体重量。)
      default boolean isItalic() 
      default void setItalic(boolean italic)
      Set the font posture(设置字体姿态)
      default void setWeight(int weight)
      Set the font weight(设置字体权重)

    • Method Detail

      • getWeight

        default int getWeight()
        Get the font weight.

        The weight of the font in the range 0 through 1000. For example, 400 is normal and 700 is bold. If this value is zero, a default weight is used.

        (获取字体重量。字体的权重，范围为0到1000。例如，400为正常，700为粗体。如果此值为零，则使用默认权重。)
        Returns:
        the font weight(字体重量)
        Since:
        POI 4.1.0

      • setWeight

        default void setWeight(int weight)
        Set the font weight(设置字体权重)
        Parameters:
        weight - the font weight(weight -字体粗细)

      • isItalic

        default boolean isItalic()
        Returns:
        true, if the font is italic(如果字体为斜体，则为true)

      • setItalic

        default void setItalic(boolean italic)
        Set the font posture(设置字体姿态)
        Parameters:
        italic - true for italic, false for regular(Italic -为true，为true，为true)

      • getFontData

        default java.lang.Object getFontData()
        Returns:
        the wrapper object holding the font data(保存字体数据的包装对象)
